amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for first responders by $20 million with $10 million for grants to State and local law enforcement for terrorism prevention activities and $10 million for firefighter assistance grants with offsets of $20 million from the Transportation Security Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the funds for first responders by $20 million.
